title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Foreign Affairs and Minister for Defence) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister foreign affair minister defence) order 2020

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Laura McGonigle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Laura McGonigle, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Foreign Affairs and the Department of 
Defence, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Foreign 
Affairs and the Minister for Defence with effect from 27 June 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

1 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [583] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH
